level.heading: Establishment of the Criminal Justice Coordinating Council.
level.text: There is established as an independent agency within the District of Columbia government the Criminal Justice Coordinating Council.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 1403 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-28, see notes following ยง 22-4231.
